DOC.brief_summary: Tai Chi widely practice Chinese martial art focus slow sequential movement , provide smooth , continuous low intensity activity . It promote improve balance strength reduce fall elderly , especially 'at risk ' . The potential benefit healthy young age cohort wider aspects health receive less attention . DOC.brief_title: Immediate Effect Tai Chi Exercise Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: 18 25 year old Have give write informed consent Have high school level education Be healthy psychologically stable determine screen medical psychiatric problem via personal interview , medical questionnaire , physical examination , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , routine medical blood urinalysis laboratory test . Have active interest explore develop spiritual life Cigarette smoker must agree abstain smoking session day Agree refrain use psychoactive drug , include alcoholic beverage , within 24 hour Agree one week session , refrain take nonprescription medication , nutritional supplement , herbal supplement except approve study investigator . Women pregnant nursing Cardiovascular condition : coronary artery disease , stroke , angina , uncontrolled hypertension , clinically significant ECG abnormality Epilepsy history seizure Insulindependent diabetes Currently take psychoactive prescription medication regular ( e.g. , daily ) basis
